tool_description: We provide location search results based on your search query.

api_list.name: search result
api_list.description: This API returns location search results according to the specified query.

required_parameters.name: q
required_parameters.description: The search query for the location.

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The latitude for the location search.

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The longitude for the location search.
